Pre-Game Insights: Adam Jones compared the 2023 Orioles to the 2014 Royals, praising their athleticism and ability to put the ball in play.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles are likely to end a seven-year postseason drought this year.
The team is eying a run of sustained success even longer than that of the 2014-15 Royals.
Others: Adam Jones, a member of the 2012 Orioles, signed a one-day contract to retire as an Oriole and spoke about the current team's potential and the importance of staying focused and believing in each other.
